page.title: 20Football and Archery
page.content: Grampound has two football teams.The senior team has been in existance for many years but the under 12's was begun in 1985.Both teams play league matches which takes them all over the County of Cornwall to play.The senior team also play cup matches when they attempt to get through each round then into the final to win a cup.All the players do not live in Grampound some come from other villages but prefer to play for Grampound. The Archery Club meets in the village hall every Thursday evening but does not attract many people from the village.Most of the members come from other villages and towns.When the weather is fine the archers practice outside on the Recreation field,but when it is wet they have to use the hall which is not so good as it is not really long enough.
